svg.script: // My corresponding testcase uses an image with preserveAspectRatio // set to "none" via SMIL animation. So the testcase's final bonus // "defer" grid-entry will end up rendering with that "none" value. var grid = generateSymbolGrid("blueRect10x10.svg#root", 40, 20, "none"); grid.setAttribute("transform", "translate(10, 10)"); document.documentElement.appendChild(grid);
